verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his army, <S%H2428><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> that were under his dominion <S%H4475><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> were fighting <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its cities, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Go <S%H1980><s%> and speak <S%H559><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him: "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H384><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he will burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire. <S%H784><s%>

'And you will not escape <S%H4422><s%> from his hand, <S%H3027><s%> for you will surely <S%H8610><s%> be captured <S%H8610><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you will see <S%H7200><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> to eye, <S%H5869><s%> and he will speak <S%H1696><s%> with you face <S%H6310><s%> to face, <S%H6310><s%> and you will go <S%H935><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>' "'

"Yet <S%H389><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah! <S%H3063><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you, 'You will not die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

'You will die <S%H4191><s%> in peace; <S%H7965><s%> and as spices were burned <S%H4955><s%> for your fathers, the former <S%H1><s%> kings <S%H7223><s%> who <S%H4428><s%> were before <S%H834><s%> you, so <S%H6440><s%> they will burn <S%H3651><s%> spices for you; and they will lament <S%H8313><s%> for you, "Alas, <S%H5594><s%> lord! <S%H1945><s%>"' For I have spoken <S%H113><s%> the word, <S%H1696><s%> "declares <S%H1697><s%> the Lord. <S%H5002><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>

when the army <S%H2428><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> was fighting <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the remaining <S%H3498><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> [that is], Lachish <S%H3923><s%> and Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> for they [alone] remained <S%H7604><s%> as fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> among the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> after <S%H310><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> release <S%H1865><s%> to them:

that each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> should set <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> his male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his female <S%H8198><s%> servant, <S%H8198><s%> a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> man <S%H5680><s%> or a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> woman; <S%H5680><s%> so that no <S%H1115><s%> one <S%H1097><s%> should keep <S%H5647><s%> them, a Jew <S%H3064><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> in bondage. <S%H5647><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the officials <S%H8269><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> obeyed, <S%H8085><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had entered <S%H935><s%> into the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> should set <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> his male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his female <S%H8198><s%> servant, <S%H8198><s%> so that no <S%H1115><s%> one <S%H1097><s%> should keep <S%H5647><s%> them any <S%H5750><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> in bondage; <S%H5647><s%> they obeyed, <S%H8085><s%> and set <S%H7971><s%> [them free.]

But afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they turned <S%H7725><s%> around <S%H7725><s%> and took <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the male <S%H5650><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> and the female <S%H8198><s%> servants, <S%H8198><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they had set <S%H7971><s%> free, <S%H2670><s%> and brought <S%H3533><s%> them into subjection <S%H3533><s%> for male <S%H5650><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> and for female <S%H8198><s%> servants. <S%H8198><s%>
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'I made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with your forefathers in the day <S%H1><s%> that I brought <S%H3117><s%> them out of the land <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> from the house <S%H4714><s%> of bondage, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H5650><s%>

"At the end <S%H7093><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you shall set <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H7971><s%> his Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has been sold <S%H4376><s%> to you and has served <S%H5647><s%> you six <S%H8337><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> you shall send <S%H7971><s%> him out free <S%H2670><s%> from you; but your forefathers did not obey <S%H1><s%> Me, or incline <S%H8085><s%> their ear <S%H5186><s%> to Me.

"Although recently <S%H3117><s%> you [had] turned <S%H7725><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H3477><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in My sight, <S%H5869><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> release <S%H1865><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and you had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me in the house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by My name. <S%H8034><s%>

"Yet you turned <S%H7725><s%> and profaned <S%H2490><s%> My name, <S%H8034><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> his male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his female <S%H8198><s%> servant, <S%H8198><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you had set <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> according to their desire, <S%H5315><s%> and you brought <S%H3533><s%> them into subjection <S%H3533><s%> to be your male <S%H5650><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> servants. <S%H8198><s%>"'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'You have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> Me in proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> release <S%H1865><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> a release <S%H1865><s%> to you,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'to the sword, <S%H2719><s%> to the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and to the famine; <S%H7458><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a terror <S%H2113><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

'And I will give <S%H5414><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> who have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have not fulfilled <S%H6965><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they made <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me, [when] they cut <S%H3772><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> in two <S%H8147><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> its parts <S%H1335><s%> –

the officials <S%H8269><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the officials <S%H8269><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the court <S%H5631><s%> officers, <S%H5631><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> who passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the parts <S%H1335><s%> of the calf <S%H5695><s%> –

and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H340><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> their life. <S%H5315><s%> And their dead <S%H5038><s%> bodies <S%H5038><s%> shall be food <S%H3978><s%> for the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

'And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his officials <S%H8269><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H340><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> their life, <S%H5315><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the army <S%H2428><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> which has gone <S%H5927><s%> away <S%H5927><s%> from you.

'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to command, <S%H6680><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'and I will bring <S%H7725><s%> them back <S%H7725><s%> to this <S%H384><s%> city; <S%H5892><s%> and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it and take <S%H3920><s%> it and burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire; <S%H784><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> without <S%H369><s%> inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>' "
